reviewText: Great movies every one.  The digital copies look just at good as when I've seen these protected from original prints.  Can't beat the price of getting them in a collection too.

I'm a fan of Hitchcock, and this blu-ray set didn't disappoint! The only thing I would change is that instead of having "North by Northwest" in the set, I would've liked to have seen "The Man Who Knew Too Much". But I love having the original posters next to the disc in the set!
